mapper.sql: ${alias}id AS ${prefix}id, ${alias}username AS ${prefix}username, ${alias}password AS ${prefix}password, ${alias}`name` AS `${prefix}name`, ${alias}email AS ${prefix}email, ${alias}resign_yn AS ${prefix}resign_yn, ${alias}create_date AS ${prefix}create_date, ${alias}update_date AS ${prefix}update_date
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account (id, username, password, name, email, role) VALUES (#{id}, #{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{role})
mapper.update: UPDATE account SET update_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , resign_yn = 'y' WHERE id = #{id}
